name: Eagle Strike
description:
This is an action and flight game in military base environment.
I am currently developing the game. In this prototype, you can see the helicopter moving around and firing missiles on targets.
This game is inspired by the series of Desert Strike, Jungle Strike and Urban Strike from Sega Genesis.

Controller UPmove forward DOWNmove backward RIGHTturn right LEFTturn left Cchange camera view TABselect target SPACEfire missile Ppick up item Odrop item ESCopen ingame menu
